caption.p: Scatter plots of PRNT 50 and FNT 50 values in Vero cells. PRNT: plaque-reduction neutralization test; FNT: flow-cytometry neutralization test. The PRNT 50 and FNT 50 were determined as the reciprocal of the last serum dilution that resulted in a 50% residual of infectivity of negative-control serum samples.
